about_the_game:
WISHLIST NOW COMRADE, THATS AN ORDER!!

Propaganda vs. Zombies is a bullet hell deck builder roguelike where you fight an onslaught of zombies. Resources are scarce and your main goal will be to convert all these zombies into Comrades with the use of Propaganda!

• Fight the Undead: Use carefully curated cards to shoot, zap, and crush the zombie menace before they overrun your borders.

• Summon Comrades: Use Propaganda Bullets (trademark pending) to convert zombies into Comrades that will spread the good word of our nation!

• Strategic Deckbuilding: Build a deck to suit your playstyle. Whether you prefer overwhelming firepower, cunning spell combos, or comrade-based tactics, there’s always a new strategy to explore.

• Shape Your Path: Make critical resource choices that open new opportunities or impose new challenges. These decisions affect your progression and can completely alter how each run unfolds.

• Roguelite Progression :Each run is unique. Randomized cards, unpredictable enemies, and different resource decisions ensure no two playthroughs are the same.

Will you answer the call to defend Hibura, or will the zombie hordes consume your country’s hopes of a bright red future? Join the revolution—Propaganda vs. Zombies awaits!
